alert.note: Alert for Iowa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iowa County through 730 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dodgeville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Barneveld, Ridgeway, Hollandale, Jonesdale, and Governor Dodge St Park. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 18 between mile markers 49 and 59. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 40 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
